net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.impl
Class TextFilterTaglet

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.impl.AbstractSimpleTaglet
      net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.impl.TextFilterTaglet
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimpleTaglet
Direct Known Subclasses:
TextFilterBlockTaglet, TextFilterInlineTaglet
public abstract class TextFilterTaglet
extends AbstractSimpleTaglet

Abstract simple taglet that features regular expression replacement of the text to print.

Version:
1.12 (2008/03/30 12:43:19)

Method Detail

setParameters

protected void setParameters(Parameter parameter)
Sets the default parameter usable by parameter filters.

Note:

Sets the qualified name, simple name and documentation root which become automatically available as parameters when using a ParamTextFilter.

Parameters:
parameter - the parameter to parse.
Since:
1.9.1
1.9.2, added "docRoot".

filter

protected final String filter(Logger logger,
                              String text)
Filters the specified input text using the text filter specified at construction time.

Parameters:
logger - logger to use for message reporting.
text - the text to filter.
Returns:
the filtered output text.
Since:
1.6.0

configure

public void configure(Logger logger,
                      Configuration configuration)
Description copied from interface: SimpleTaglet
Configures this "simple" taglet.

Notes:

The SimpleTaglet.configure(Logger, Configuration) method is called at the start of the taglet lifecycle, prior to calling any output methods.

The configuration parameters of each "simple" taglet are taglet specific.

Specified by:
configure in interface SimpleTaglet
Overrides:
configure in class AbstractSimpleTaglet
Parameters:
logger - the logger to use for message output during configuration.
configuration - the taglets configuration to use for configuration.
Since:
1.6.0
